rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {1737, 4201, D6001%} Do true Otherwise Must have passed 48 credit points at levels {1, 2, 3} from units owned by {50000564}

unitName: Geography education in the secondary years A
description: This unit prepares students to become effective and knowledgeable specialist geography teachers. It develops students' knowledge and understanding of current policies, theories, research principles and methods in geography education nationally and internationally. Additionally, students research how these impact on curriculum and pedagogy for geography teachers. The unit involves research into various strategies, resources, policies, activities and forms of assessment for geography education.
